renderpass.code:
// inspired from https://www.shadertoy.com/view/XlsfDr

#define D(a,b)  fwidth( R = U-2.4 + dot( vec4(a 13,5,b 2,1), cos( asin( pow( abs(U.x)/16., .33) ) * vec4(1,2,3,4) ))).y / abs(R.y) /3.

#define mainImage(O,u)                   \
    vec2 R =  iResolution.xy,            \
         U = 19.* ( u+u - R.xy ) / R.y;  \
    O +=  D( - , ) +  D( , - )



// note that O +=  D( , - ) +  D( - , )  is -3 chars,  but I guess it won't work on windows.
renderpass.name: Image
